mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT MENU_CD ,MENU_NM ,PROG_NM ,MENU_REF ,MENU_IDX ,MENU_DIV ,PROG_TP ,USE_YN ,SEQ ,HMENU_CD FROM ( WITH DETAIL_MENU AS (SELECT HM.MENU_CD AS HMENU_CD , MM.MENU_CD AS MMENU_CD , DM.MENU_CD AS DMENU_CD FROM WMENU HM , WMENU DM , WMENU MM , W_MENU_USER MU , TEMP01 EP WHERE HM.MENU_CD = MM.MENU_REF AND HM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MM.MENU_CD = DM.MENU_REF AND MM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DM.MENU_CD = MU.MENU_CD AND DM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MU.USER_ID = EP.POSITION AND MU.AUTHORITY = 'Y' AND EP.USERID =#{username} UNION ALL SELECT HM.MENU_CD AS HMENU_CD , MM.MENU_CD AS MMENU_CD , DM.MENU_CD AS DMENU_CD FROM WMENU HM , WMENU DM , WMENU MM , W_MENU_USER MU , TCNT01_EMP EP WHERE HM.MENU_CD = MM.MENU_REF AND HM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MM.MENU_CD = DM.MENU_REF AND MM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DM.MENU_CD = MU.MENU_CD AND DM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MU.USER_ID = EP.CUST_CODE AND MU.AUTHORITY = 'Y' AND EP.ID =#{username} ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.MENU_CD ,A.MENU_NM ,NVL(A.PROG_NM, ' ') PROG_NM ,A.MENU_REF ,A.MENU_IDX ,A.MENU_DIV ,A.PROG_TP ,A.USE_YN ,1 AS SEQ ,0 AS HMENU_CD FROM WMENU A WHERE A.MENU_CD IN (SELECT HMENU_CD FROM DETAIL_MENU GROUP BY HMENU_CD) UNION ALL SELECT A.MENU_CD ,A.MENU_NM ,NVL(A.PROG_NM, ' ') PROG_NM ,A.MENU_REF ,A.MENU_IDX ,A.MENU_DIV ,A.PROG_TP ,A.USE_YN ,2 AS SEQ ,0 AS HMENU_CD FROM WMENU A WHERE A.MENU_CD IN (SELECT MMENU_CD FROM DETAIL_MENU GROUP BY MMENU_CD) UNION ALL SELECT A.MENU_CD ,A.MENU_NM ,NVL(A.PROG_NM, ' ') PROG_NM ,A.MENU_REF ,A.MENU_IDX ,A.MENU_DIV ,A.PROG_TP ,A.USE_YN ,3 AS SEQ ,C.MENU_CD AS HMENU_CD FROM WMENU A , WMENU B , WMENU C WHERE A.MENU_CD IN (SELECT DMENU_CD FROM DETAIL_MENU GROUP BY DMENU_CD) AND A.MENU_REF = B.MENU_CD AND B.MENU_REF = C.MENU_CD ) ) WHERE MENU_CD IS NOT NULL CONNECT BY nocycle MENU_REF = PRIOR MENU_CD ORDER SIBLINGS BY SEQ, MENU_IDX
